html: Shall bring—But altho' God will deliver you at this time, yet he will requite all your wickedness. Thee—For part of this Assyrian storm fell in Ahaz's reign. And—Upon thy sons and successors, the kings of Judah. Days—Calamities. Departed—When ten tribes revolted from thy father's house. The king—Who may well be called their plague or calamity, as he is called the rod of God's anger, Isaiah 10:5.
